mapper.sql: id, rankid, userid, createtime, updatetime, sortnum, iswinning, icount, likes, flowers, status, acceptaward, isfashionman,complaintotalcount,checkstatus, checkresult,checkuserid,checkdate,awardid,awardlevel,receivecode,publishawarddate, downfashionmantime,upfashionmantime,sort

id, rankid, userid, createtime, updatetime, sortnum, iswinning, icount, rankfinishlikes as likes, rankfinishflower as flowers, status, acceptaward, isfashionman,complaintotalcount,checkstatus, checkresult,checkuserid,checkdate,awardid,awardlevel,receivecode,publishawarddate, downfashionmantime,upfashionmantime,sort,rankfinishlikes,rankfinishflower
mapper.select: SELECT sum(icount) from rank_members where rankid=#{rankid} AND status='1'
SELECT sum(icount) FROM rank_members WHERE rankid=#{rankid} AND status='1'
SELECT count(*) FROM rank_members where rankid=#{rankid} AND checkstatus != '1'

select rank_award_release.awardnickname, rank.rankid, rank_members.userid, rank.endtime, rank_award_release.awardid awardid from rank inner join rank_award_release on rank_award_release.rankid = rank.rankid inner join rank_members on rank.rankid = rank_members.rankid where rank_members.awardid = rank_award_release.awardid and rank_members.awardlevel = 1 and rank_members.iswinning = 1 and rank.isfinish = 5 order by rank.endtime DESC limit 0,6
mapper.insert: insert into rank_members (id, rankid, userid, createtime, updatetime, sortnum, iswinning, icount, likes, flowers,status, acceptaward, isfashionman) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{iswinning,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{icount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowers,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{acceptaward,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isfashionman,jdbcType=CHAR})

id,
rankid,
userid,
createtime,

sortnum,
iswinning,

likes,
flowers,

mapper.update:
update rank_members
rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
iswinning = #{iswinning,jdbcType=CHAR},
icount = #{icount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
likes = #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flowers = #{flowers,jdbcType=INTEGER},
acceptaward = #{acceptaward,jdbcType=CHAR},
isfashionman = #{isfashionman,jdbcType=CHAR},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update rank_members set rankid = #{rankid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sortnum = #{sortnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, iswinning = #{iswinning,jdbcType=CHAR}, icount = #{icount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, likes = #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flowers = #{flowers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, acceptaward = #{acceptaward,jdbcType=CHAR}, isfashionman = #{isfashionman,jdbcType=CHAR}, status =#{status} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update rank_members set rankfinishlikes = likes, rankfinishflower = flowers where rankid = #{rankid}

update rank_members
status = #{status},
icount =0, likes =0, flowers =0,
sortnum = #{sortNum},
checkstatus = #{checkstatus},
acceptaward = #{acceptaward},
updatetime = #{updateTime},
isfashionman = #{isfashionman}
where userid = #{userId} and rankid = #{rankId}

UPDATE rank_members
iswinning = #{iswinning},
awardid = #{rankAward.awardid},
awardlevel = #{rankAward.awardlevel},
isfashionman = #{isfashionman},
checkstatus = #{checkstatus},
checkuserid = #{checkuserid},
checkdate = #{checkdate},
isfashionman = #{isfashionman},
checkresult = #{checkresult},
status = #{status},
receivecode = #{receivecode},
updatetime = #{updatetime},
icount = icount+#{icount},
upfashionmantime = #{upfashionmantime},
downfashionmantime = #{downfashionmantime},
sort = #{sort},
acceptaward = #{acceptaward},
where rankid = #{rankid} and userid = #{userid}
mapper.select:
select
from rank_members
status = 1 and rankId = #{rankId}
order by rankfinishlikes desc,createtime asc
order by likes desc,createtime asc
order by rankfinishflower desc,createtime asc
order by flowers desc,createtime asc
order by sortnum asc,createtime asc
limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}

select userid , rank_members.awardid, -- award.awardtitle awardnickname, rank_members.awardlevel, count(1) awardcount -- award.awardphotos awardphotos, -- award.awardprice awardprice from rank_members -- award where -- award.id= rank_members.awardid -- and iswinning = 1 and rankid = #{rankid} group by awardlevel order by awardlevel

select rank_members.userid, rank_members.awardlevel, rank_members.awardid from rank_members where rank_members.iswinning = 1 and rank_members.checkstatus = 3 and rank_members.rankid =#{rankid} order by rank_members.awardlevel
select count(1) from rank_members where updatetime < #{lastUpdateTime} and status = 1 and icount = 0 and rankid = #{rankId}
mapper.update: update rank_members set status = 2 where id in ( select * from ( select temp.id from rank_members temp where temp.updatetime < #{lastUpdateTime} and temp.status = 1 and temp.icount = 0 and temp.rankid = #{rankId} order by temp.updatetime limit 1 ) foo )
mapper.select: select temp.userid from rank_members temp where temp.updatetime < #{lastUpdateTime} and temp.status = 1 and temp.icount = 0 and temp.rankid = #{rankId} order by temp.updatetime limit 1
